name: Ridge Racer Driftopia
description:
Ridge Racer Driftopia is a racing-arcade game developed by Bugbear Entertainment. It was originally released in 2013. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
Ridge Racer Driftopia is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
Akitaka Tohyama, Ayako Saso, Hiroshi Okubo and Nobuyoshi Sano scored the game.
